title: Riot Games soft-endorsment of bot programs.
body:
https://i.ibb.co/Mkxqvxg/riot-endorses-botting.png

The rules don't apply to cheaters. If you cheat, you FORFEIT the right to be protected from "naming and shaming."

You people disgust me. I have such a deep-seated hatred for you and everything you stand for that I'd be here all night thinking up adjectives to describe it if I thought it would change anything about who you choose to be.
